revision.description: The base schema for the Mixxx SQLITE database.
Add a header_parsed integer column to the library to indicate when a track's tags have been parsed.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE library ADD COLUMN header_parsed integer DEFAULT 0;

revision.description: Change the location column to be a an integer. Change comment to be varchar(256) and album/artist/title to be varchar(64).

revision.sql: ALTER TABLE library ADD COLUMN filetype varchar(8) DEFAULT "?";

revision.description: Add needs_verification column to library hashes table.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE LibraryHashes ADD COLUMN needs_verification INTEGER DEFAULT 0;
ALTER TABLE library ADD COLUMN replaygain float DEFAULT 0;

revision.description: Add timesplayed and rating column. Reset header state.

revision.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS traktor_library ( id INTEGER primary key AUTOINCREMENT, artist varchar(48), title varchar(48), album varchar(48), year varchar(16), genre varchar(32), tracknumber varchar(3), location varchar(512) UNIQUE, comment varchar(60), duration integer, bitrate integer, bpm float, key varchar(6), rating integer ); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS traktor_playlists ( id INTEGER primary key, name varchar(100) UNIQUE ); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS traktor_playlist_tracks ( id INTEGER primary key AUTOINCREMENT, playlist_id INTEGER REFERENCES traktor_playlist(id), track_id INTEGER REFERENCES traktor_library(id) );
ALTER TABLE crates ADD COLUMN locked integer DEFAULT 0; ALTER TABLE playlists ADD COLUMN locked integer DEFAULT 0;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rhythmbox_library ( id INTEGER primary key AUTOINCREMENT, artist varchar(48), title varchar(48), album varchar(48), year varchar(16), genre varchar(32), tracknumber varchar(3), location varchar(512) UNIQUE, comment varchar(60), duration integer, bitrate integer, bpm float, key varchar(6), rating integer ); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rhythmbox_playlists ( id INTEGER primary key AUTOINCREMENT, name varchar(100) UNIQUE ); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rhythmbox_playlist_tracks ( id INTEGER primary key AUTOINCREMENT, playlist_id INTEGER REFERENCES rhythmbox_playlist(id), track_id INTEGER REFERENCES rhythmbox_library(id) );

revision.description: Add beats column to library table.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE Library ADD COLUMN beats BLOB; ALTER TABLE Library ADD COLUMN beats_version TEXT;

revision.description: Add position column to Rhythmbox, iTunes, and Traktor playlist tables.
Add composer column to library table.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE library ADD COLUMN composer varchar(64) DEFAULT "";
ALTER TABLE PlaylistTracks ADD COLUMN pl_datetime_added;

revision.description: Add columns for BPM lock and a sub-version string for beats.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE Library ADD COLUMN bpm_lock INTEGER DEFAULT 0; ALTER TABLE Library ADD COLUMN beats_sub_version TEXT DEFAULT '';

revision.description: Add keys column to library table.
